Html: IsEnabled Property is not working if Button is using Command.Click  "Drop 9". Is there any update in Drop 10?

Hi Michael,

I checked out the EventAggregator QS which uses this property, and the enablement is working.

Is it possible that you still have the old DLLs lying around? Command.Click should give you a parse error, because it was renamed to Click.Command.
Please not that in drop 10 the DLLs are now stripped of the ".Silverlight" suffix, so it might be a reason why you may still have the old DLLs not overwritten.

I hope this helps,
Julian Dominguez
http://blogs.southworks.net/jdominguez
